summary: ON FRIDAY OCTOBER 26, 2018, MY BATTERY DIED.  I HAD IT REPLACED AFTER THE TOW COMPANY DIAGNOSED IT.  IT WAS LATER DISCOVERED THAT THE ALTERNATOR WAS MALFUNCTIONG.  MY CAR ON A BUSY INTERSECTION JUST DIED WITH ON COMING HEAVY TRAFFIC.  I COULD NOT MOVE OR PUT IT IN NUETURAL TO MOVE IT.  IT HAD TO BE JUMPED IN ORDER TO CLEAR THE DANGEROUS SITUATION.  MY CONCERN THAT THE CAR JUST LOCKED UP, NO POWER OR ABILITY TO MOVE.  I COULD NOT USE MY HAZARD LIGHTS.  A VERY UNSAFE SITUATION.  THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION AND THEN I WAS ACCELERATING THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN EVERYTHING WENT DARK.   PLEASE ADVISE OF WHAT TYPE OF DOCUMENTATION YOU WILL NEED FOR THIS FILE?  I AM JUST WRITING BECAUSE THIS WAS A SAFETY RELATED MALFUNCTIONING THAT WAS LIFE THREATENING.
